stories.title: Ten things I’ve never heard a successful startup founder say (2011)

stories.text:
I had a falling out with a friend, which happens from time to time and eventually forget, but I realized I haven't been outraged in a while.

Here is how it'd go:

He would be read something from twitter, be outraged (the world is big something is always happening).

Then he'd bring it up in a conversation. I'd look it up and be appalled.

Problem is we wouldn't do anything, we would just talk hours about it and then few days move on to another thing completely forgetting about it.

Few years earlier I completely gave up regular news and only stick to science and business news.
